Description: Welcome to your team Agent in real estate!Responsibilities:- Search and selection of objects- Organization of views of real estate- Registration of deals- Maintenance of client base- Finding new clients- Maintaining long-term professional relationships with clientsTerms & Conditions:- Comfortable office in the heart of Dubai, The Opus Tower- Visa + RERA card- On execution of the sales plan your commission percentage is 60%, in case of non-execution 50%.- You can build your day - the main result- Work with the top developersSkills
Skills: - Developed communication skills (active listening, negotiation skills, basic sales techniques, etc.)
- Proactive and proactive attitude to life
-Commitment, readiness to uphold company values and standards
- 2 or more years of working experience in real estate
